mapper.insert: insert into springbootweb.product (productName, productConcessionary, productPrice, productActualPayment, dateOfManufacture, productINFO) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productConcessionary}, #{productPrice}, #{productActualPayment}, #{dateOfManufacture}, #{productINFO})
mapper.update: update springbootweb.product set productName = #{productName}, productConcessionary = #{productConcessionary}, productPrice = #{productPrice}, productActualPayment = #{productActualPayment}, dateOfManufacture = #{dateOfManufacture}, productINFO = #{productINFO} where id= #{id}
